thumb.title: 『LUPIN THE IIIRD THE MOVIE 不死身の血族 』劇場公開記念特番～ルパン三世を100倍楽しむ方法～
thumb.description: https://youtu.be/VOGUywpOxIE?si=wkcgdlxKx4r5LS4fTMS Anime Official ChannelJul 6, 2025 #LUPINTHEIIIRDTHEMOVIE #不死身の血族 #BzA gorgeous cast of Kanichi Kurita as Lupin III, Akio Otsuka as Daisuke Dimension, Daisuke Namikawa as Goemon Ishikawa, and Koichi Yamadera as Inspector Zenigata gather in this special program ✨ to look back on the history of "Lupin III" and talk about the highlights of this work
